41.1.behavioral_axis: Knows who should hold what feeling/resource so nothing is wasted.
41.1.shadow_axis: Dumps feelings too fast or onto the wrong person when pressured.

41.2.behavioral_axis: Shares feelings/resources only when personal base is secure.
41.2.shadow_axis: People-pleasing that burns through limited fuel.

41.3.hd_quote: In times of decrease selfishness is justified.
41.3.behavioral_axis: Pulls energy back to ensure the cycle can actually start.
41.3.shadow_axis: Looks selfish or ungenerous when resources are low.

41.4.behavioral_axis: Reorganizes relationships and feelings around what the field actually has.
41.4.shadow_axis: Holds on to weak ties and bleeds energy.

41.5.hd_quote: The external recognition of one's potential despite limitations.
41.5.behavioral_axis: When seen, can direct the cycle and feelings for the group.
41.5.shadow_axis: If not seen, turns dissatisfaction into emotional negativity.

41.6.hd_quote: The law that the maximization of potential not only ends decrease but inevitably such transcendence benefits others.
41.6.behavioral_axis: When the feeling is right and maximized, everyone nearby benefits.
41.6.shadow_axis: Withholds success out of fear it will be taken.
